wikitext.*:
{{disambig-more|ten|[[ten (disambiguation)]]}}
'''TEÑ''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "show, sign, indicate, signify, to point at".<ref name=WJ>{{WJ|AD}}, p. 394 (root appearing as "*TEÑ")</ref><ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, pp. 44, 187 (root appearing as "√TEÑ")</ref> The root is related to [[TEK]] ("sign").<ref name=PE17/>

==Derivatives==

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''[[tenwe]]''<ref name=WJ/> or ''teñwa'' > ''[[teiw]]''<ref name=PE17/>
**[[Quenya]]: ''[[tengwe]]'' ("indication, sign, token"); ''[[tengwesta]]''; ''[[tengwa]]''<ref name=WJ/>

==Other versions==

Note that the roots [[TEN#Other versions|TEÑ<sup>1</sup> and TEÑ<sup>2</sup>]], with different significations, appear in the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]''.<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, pp. 391-2</ref>

In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appears the root TEŊE ("know, understand").<ref name=PE17/><ref>{{PE|12}}</ref>
